TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlTextAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 表示 在序列化或還原序列化包含它的類別之後，應該將成員視為 XML 文字。

span.span: Indicates to the that the member must be treated as XML text when the class that contains it is serialized or deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬於一系列屬性可控制如何序列化和還原序列化物件 (透過其和方法)。The belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes and deserializes an object (through its and methods). 如需類似屬性的完整清單，請參閱[屬性，控制 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md). 只有一個執行個體類別，可套用在類別中。Only one instance of the class can be applied in a class. 您可以套用公用欄位和公用讀取/寫入屬性會傳回基本類型和列舉型別。You can apply the to public fields and public read/write properties that return primitive and enumeration types. 您可以套用欄位或屬性，傳回字串陣列。You can apply the to a field or property that returns an array of strings. 您也可以套用屬性的型別陣列，但是您必須設定字串的屬性。You can also apply the attribute to an array of type but you must set the property to string. 在此情況下，任何陣列中插入的字串會序列化為 XML 文字。In that case, any strings inserted into the array are serialized as XML text. 也可以套用至傳回欄位或陣列物件。The can also be applied to a field that returns an or an array of objects. 根據預設，序列化為 XML 項目類別成員。By default, the serializes a class member as an XML element. 不過，如果您套用給成員，它的值轉譯為 XML 文字。However, if you apply the to a member, the translates its value into XML text. 這表示此值會編碼為 XML 項目的內容。This means that the value is encoded into the content of an XML element. [XML 結構描述定義工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)偶爾會產生時建立的類別從 XML 結構描述定義 (XSD) 檔案。The [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md) occasionally generates the when creating classes from an XML Schema definition (XSD) file. 這會發生時的結構描述包含`complexType`具有混合內容; 在此情況下，對應的類別包含要傳回的字串陣列的成員套用。This occurs when the schema contains a `complexType` with mixed content; in that case, the corresponding class contains a member that returns a string array to which the is applied. 例如，當`Xml Schema Definition`工具就會處理此結構描述：For example, when the `Xml Schema Definition` tool processes this schema: ``` ``` 會產生下列類別 （額外的空格和註解已移除）：the following class is generated (extra spaces and remarks have been removed): [!code-csharp[XmlTextAttribute#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTextAttribute/cs/source.cs#0)] [!code-vb[XmlTextAttribute#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTextAttribute/vb/source.vb#0)] 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 您可以使用 word`XmlText`取代較長程式碼中。You can use the word `XmlText` in your code instead of the longer . ## Examples [!code-cpp[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以覆寫的方式，序列化公用欄位或公用讀取/寫入屬性，藉由建立，並設定其屬性。You can override the way that the serializes a public field or public read/write property by creating an , and setting its property to an . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more details, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，其中包含名為的公用欄位`Comment`。The following example serializes a class that contains a public field, named `Comment`. 此範例套用到欄位，藉此覆寫其序列化為 XML 項目，並改為將它序列化為 XML 文字。The example applies an to the field, thereby overriding its serialization as an XML element, and instead serializing it as XML text. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlTextAttribute.XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute.XmlTextAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlTextAttribute.XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute.XmlTextAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlTextAttribute.XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute.XmlTextAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以覆寫的方式，序列化公用欄位或公用讀取/寫入屬性，藉由建立，並設定其屬性。You can override the way that the serializes a public field or public read/write property by creating an , and setting its property to an . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more details, see the class. ## Examples [!code-cpp[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 所產生之文字的XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 資料型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML Schema definition language (XSD) data type of the text generated by the .

value.span: XML 結構描述 (XSD) 資料型別，如全球資訊網協會 (www.w3.org ) 文件＜XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes＞中所定義。

span.span: An XML Schema (XSD) data type, as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定到 XML 結構描述簡單資料類型的屬性會影響所產生的 XML 格式。Setting the property to an XML Schema simple data type affects the format of the generated XML. 例如，將屬性設定為 「 日期 」 會造成產生的文字來格式化一般日期樣式，例如： 2001年-08-31。For example, setting the property to "date" causes the generated text to be formatted in the general date style, for example: 2001-08-31. 相反地，將屬性設定為"dateTime"的結果，會導致由國際標準組織所定義的標準化文件 8601，「 表示相互轉換的日期和時間 」，例如： 2001年-08-15T06:59:11.0508456-07:00。By contrast, setting the property to "dateTime" results in a specific instant as defined by the International Organization for Standardization document 8601, "Representations of Dates and Times", for example: 2001-08-15T06:59:11.0508456-07:00. 設定的效果時使用，也會看到屬性[XML 結構描述定義工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)產生 XML 結構描述編譯的檔案。The effect of setting the property can also be seen when using the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md) to generate the XML Schema for a compiled file. 如需有關如何使用工具的詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 結構描述定義工具和 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/the-xml-schema-definition-tool-and-xml-serialization.md)。For more information on using the tool, see [The XML Schema Definition Tool and XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/the-xml-schema-definition-tool-and-xml-serialization.md). 下表列出與它們對應的.NET 之 XML 結構描述簡單資料類型。The following table lists the XML Schema simple data types with their .NET equivalents. XML 結構描述`base64Binary`和`hexBinary`資料類型使用的陣列結構，並套用與"base64Binary"或"hexBinary"，適當地設定。For the XML Schema `base64Binary` and `hexBinary` data types, use an array of structures, and apply a with the set to "base64Binary" or "hexBinary", as appropriate. XML 結構描述`time`和`date`資料類型，使用輸入和套用與設為 「 日期 」 或 「 時間 」。For the XML Schema `time` and `date` data types, use the type and apply the with the set to "date" or "time". 對應到字串，每一個 XML 結構描述資料型別，套用具有其屬性設定為 XML 結構描述資料類型。For every XML Schema data type that is mapped to a string, apply the with its property set to the XML Schema data type. 請注意這不會變更序列化格式，只有該成員的結構描述。Note that this does not change the serialization format, only the schema for the member. > [!NOTE] > 屬性是區分大小寫，，因此您必須將它設定於其中一個 XML 結構描述資料類型。The property is case-sensitive, so you must set it exactly to one of the XML Schema data types. > [!NOTE] > 將二進位資料做為 XML 項目會比將它傳遞為 XML 屬性更有效率。Passing binary data as an XML element is more efficient than passing it as an XML attribute. 如需有關 XML 結構描述資料類型的詳細資訊，請參閱全球資訊網協會 (www.w3.org) 文件名為 「 XML 結構描述組件 2:: 資料類型"。For more information about XML Schema data types, see the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document named "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes". |XSD 資料類型XSD data type|.NET 資料類型.NET data type| |-------------------|--------------------| |anyURIanyURI|| |base64Binarybase64Binary|陣列物件Array of objects| |booleanboolean|| |bytebyte|| |datedate|| |dateTimedateTime|| |decimaldecimal|| |doubledouble|| |ENTITYENTITY|| |實體ENTITIES|| |floatfloat|| |gDaygDay|| |gMonthgMonth|| |gMonthDaygMonthDay|| |gYeargYear|| |gYearMonthgYearMonth|| |hexBinaryhexBinary|陣列物件Array of objects| |識別碼ID|| |IDREFIDREF|| |IDREFSIDREFS|| |intint|| |整數integer|| |語言language|| |longlong|| |名稱Name|| |NCNameNCName|| |negativeIntegernegativeInteger|| |NMTOKENNMTOKEN|| |NMTOKENSNMTOKENS|| |normalizedStringnormalizedString|| |nonNegativeIntegernonNegativeInteger|| |nonPositiveIntegernonPositiveInteger|| |NOTATIONNOTATION|| |positiveIntegerpositiveInteger|| |QNameQName|| |持續期間duration|| |字串string|| |shortshort|| |時間time|| |tokentoken|| |unsignedByteunsignedByte|| |unsignedIntunsignedInt|| |unsignedLongunsignedLong|| |unsignedShortunsignedShort|| ## Examples [!code-cpp[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 您指定的 XML 結構描述資料型別無法對應至 .NET 資料型別。

span.span: The XML Schema data type you have specified cannot be mapped to the .NET data type.

exception.span: 您指定的 XML 結構描述資料型別對於該屬性無效，且無法轉換為成員型別。

span.span: The XML Schema data type you have specified is invalid for the property and cannot be converted to the member type.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ Type { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定成員的型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of the member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性只能設定基本類型和列舉型別。The property can only be set to primitive types and enumerations. 也可以套用至傳回欄位或陣列物件。The can also be applied to a field that returns an or an array of objects. 您可以套用欄位或屬性，傳回字串陣列。You can apply the to a field or property that returns an array of strings. 您也可以套用屬性的型別陣列，但是您必須設定字串的屬性。You can also apply the attribute to an array of type but you must set the property to string. 在此情況下，任何陣列中插入的字串會序列化為 XML 文字。In that case, any strings inserted into the array are serialized as XML text. ## Examples [!code-cpp[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlTextAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTextAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
